Class MenuUtils

java.lang.Object
DiaryProject.MenuUtils
public class MenuUtils extends Object
Utility class for handling menu operations in the Diary Project.

  • Method Details

    • showMenu

      public static void showMenu()
      Shows main menu.

    • useMenu

      public static boolean useMenu(int option, Scanner scan, Event[][][] myDiary)
      Manages the main menu options. It loops until a correct option is chosen.
      Parameters:
      option - The user's choice.
      scan - The Scanner object to read user input.
      myDiary - The array that keeps events.
      Returns:
      true if the option is valid, false otherwise.
      See Also:
      • MenuOne.menuOne(Scanner, Event[][][])
      • showSubMenu()

    • showSubMenu

      private static void showSubMenu()
      Shows the submenu.

    • useSubMenu

      private static boolean useSubMenu(int option, Event[][][] myDiary, Scanner scan)
      Manage the submenu options. It loops until a correct option is chosen.
      Parameters:
      option - The user's choice.
      myDiary - The array that keeps events.
      scan - The Scanner object to read user input.
      Returns:
      true if the option is valid, false otherwise.
      See Also:
      • MenuTwo.subMenuOne(Event[][][])
      • MenuTwo.subMenuTwo(Event[][][])
      • MenuTwo.subMenuThree(Event[][][])
      • MenuTwo.subMenuFour(Event[][][], Scanner)
